id.quote:
There was a time that the pieces fit, but I watched them fall away
Mildewed and smoldering, strangled by our coveting
The sun shines, but I don't.

I've journeyed here and there, and back again
But in the same old haunts I still find my friends
And in the eyes of the jackal, I say KABOOM!
To all my friends: blood makes the blade holy!
We are all searching for someone whose demons play well with our own.

I'm makin' love to the angel of death
Catchin' feelings, never stumble, retracin' my steps
Froth at the top, dregs at the bottom, but the middle excellent.
Those who can make you believe absurdities can make you commit atrocities.
Illusion is the first of all pleasures.
Talent was not rare; the ability to survive having it was.
That is why I never use the Microscope any more to look at things that were made by Men - the rudeness and bungling of Art is painful to view.
Hoops of gold are stronger than bands of steel.
By populating the world with so many minds, each with its own point of view, God gives us a suggestion of what it means to be omniscient.
To merely set foot in such people's houses and show them common courtesy was to be complicit in their whole system of power.
Dead eyes, dead eyes... are you just like me?
